endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all rentable household electronic devices.
Initiate a rental for a specific household electronic by providing device ID and rental duration.
Fetch information about a specific rental using its rental ID.
Extend the rental duration of an active rental by providing an additional time period.
Coordinate the return of a rented device using its rental ID.
Check the availability of a specific household electronic device.
Retrieve the rental history for the user, including past and active rentals.
Provide available recycling options for used household electronics.
Submit a review for an electronic device post-rental to share user feedback.
Retrieve contact information for support related to rentals and device issues.
